languages.text: В некоторых случаях персонаж может получить {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} по касательной. Например, попав в зону действия атаки по области из дистанционного оружия, персонаж может воспользоваться {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытием{/g}, но не пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} или не суметь выйти из области поражения. В этих случаях он неминуемо получит урон от попадания по касательной.
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take damage from Grazing Hit. For example, if a character is int the area of ​​effect of an {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}AoE attack from a ranged weapon{/g} and takes cover, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Dodge Test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in this cases, they will inevitably take damage from Grazing Hit.

traits.locale_text: В некоторых случаях персонаж может получить урон от попадания по касательной. Например, попав в зону действия {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}атаки по области из дальнобойного оружия{/g}, персонаж может воспользоваться укрытием, но не пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} или не суметь выйти из области поражения. В этих случаях он неминуемо получит урон от попадания по касательной.

В некоторых случаях персонаж может получить урон от попадания по касательной. Например, попав в зону действия {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}атаки по области из дальнобойного оружия{/g}, персонаж может воспользоваться укрытием, но не пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} или не суметь выйти из области поражения. В этих случаях он неминуемо получит урон от попадания по касательной.

languages.text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.
languages.original_text: В некоторых случаях персонаж может получить урон от попадания по касательной. Например, попав в зону действия {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}атаки по области из дальнобойного оружия{/g}, персонаж может воспользоваться укрытием, но не пройти проверку {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонения{/g} или не суметь выйти из области поражения. В этих случаях он неминуемо получит урон от попадания по касательной.

traits.locale_text: In some cases, the character can take damage in the form of a grazing hit. For example, if a character is in the area of effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}ranged area attack{/g} and takes cover, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

languages.text: In einigen Fällen kann der Charakter {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} in Form eines {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffers{/g} durch einen Streifschuss erleiden. Wenn sich ein Charakter im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} eines {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Flächenangriffs befindet und in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} geht, aber eine {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht besteht oder den Bereich nicht verlassen kann, erleidet er Schaden durch einen Streifschuss.
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

traits.locale_text: In manchen Fällen kann der Charakter Schaden in Form eines {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffers{/g} durch einen Streifschuss erleiden. Wenn sich ein Charakter zum Beispiel im {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Wirkungsbereich{/g} eines {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Flächenangriffs befindet und in {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} geht, aber eine {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweich-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht besteht, oder es nicht schafft, sich aus dem Bereich zu bewegen – in diesen Fällen erleidet er unweigerlich Schaden durch einen {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}Streifschuss{/g}.

languages.text: Dans certains cas, le personnage peut subir des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}effleurement{/g}. Par exemple, si un personnage se trouve dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} d'une attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et se met à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, mais échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} ou ne parvient pas à sortir de la zone, il subit inévitablement des dégâts d'effleurement.
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

traits.locale_text: Dans certains cas, le personnage peut subir des dégâts sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} de griffe. Par exemple, si un personnage se trouve dans la {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}zone d'effet{/g} d'une attaque de zone {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} et se met à {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}couvert{/g}, mais échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} ou ne parvient pas à sortir de la zone, il subit inévitablement des dégâts sous forme de {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}coup de griffe{/g}.

languages.text: 在某些情况下，角色会受到流弹攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}。例如，如果某个角色身处{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}范围攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}攻击范围{/g}内，躲在了{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面，但未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，或未能离开攻击区域。在这种情况下，这个角色将会受到流弹攻击伤害。
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

traits.locale_text: 在某些情况下，角色会受到流弹攻击的伤害。{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g}例如，如果某个角色身处{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}的攻击范围内，躲在了{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体{/g}后面，但未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，或未能离开攻击区域。在这种情况下，这个角色将会受到{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}流弹攻击{/g}伤害。

languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take damage in the form of a grazing hit. For example, if a character is in the area of effect of a {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacks}ranged area attack{/g} and takes cover, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

languages.text: En algunos casos, los personajes pueden recibir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por un rasguño. Por ejemplo, si un personaje que está en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de un ataque de área {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} se pone a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g}, pero falla la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o no consigue abandonar la zona, recibirá daño inevitable como rasguño{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

traits.locale_text: En algunos casos, los personajes pueden recibir daño por un rasguño.{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}{/g} Por ejemplo, si un personaje que está en el {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}área de efecto{/g} de un ataque de área {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} se pone a {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cubierto{/g}, pero falla la {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} o no consigue abandonar la zona, recibirá daño inevitable como {g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}rasguño{/g}.

languages.text: キャラクターが擦過攻撃として{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}受ける{/g}場合もある。例えば、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}範囲攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内で{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろにいるが{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗あるいはエリアから退避できなかった場合、擦過攻撃としてダメージを受ける。
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターが擦過{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}攻撃{/g}としてダメージを受ける場合もある。例えば、キャラクターが{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}範囲攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}効果範囲{/g}内で{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}遮蔽物{/g}の後ろにいるが{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗あるいはエリアから退避できなかった場合、{g|Encyclopedia:GrazingHit}擦過攻撃{/g}としてダメージを受ける。

languages.text: Bazı durumlarda yapılan {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş{/g}, karakterde sıyrık şeklinde {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasara{/g} sebep olabilir. Örneğin bir karakter, {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} bir alan saldırısının {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}etki alanı{/g} içindeyken {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper{/g} alırsa ancak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testinden{/g} geçemez veya o alandan çıkamazsa kaçınılmaz olarak sıyrık hasarı alacaktır.
languages.original_text: In some cases, the character can take {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} in the form of a grazing {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}. For example, if a character is in the {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area of effect{/g} of a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} area attack and takes {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g}, but fails a {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or fails to move out of the area — in these cases, they will inevitably take damage as a grazing hit.
